original_text: “See that you don’t tell this to anyone. But go, show yourself to the priest and offer the sacrifices that Moses commanded for your cleansing, as a testimony to them.”
korean_text: 이르시되 삼가 아무에게 아무 말도 하지 말고 가서 네 몸을 제사장에게 보이고 네가 깨끗하게 되었으니 모세가 명한 것을 드려 그들에게 입증하라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: See that you don't tell this to anyone.
But go, show yourself to the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 가서 제사장에게 너 자신을 보이고

sentences.original_text: that Moses commanded for your cleansing,
